fields.description: Specifies the timeout for writing each chunk to SFTP server. Default value: 01:00:00 (one hour). Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: OperationTimeout

fields.description: Upload to temporary file(s) and rename. Disable this option if your SFTP server doesn't support rename operation. Type: boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: UseTempFileRename
